text: Jatimonro ʙijozmoed, to on goh, ki ʙa sinni zanosui rasand, pas agar dar onon rusde jofted, molhojasonro ʙa xudason ʙisupored, Va az ʙimi on, ki maʙod ʙa sinni rusd rasand, molhojasonro ʙa nohaq va sitoʙ mexured. Har ki tavongar ast, ʙiparhezad va har ki ʙenavost, ʙa on miqdor, ki urf tasdiq kunad, ʙixurad. Va cun amvolasonro taslimason karded, kasonero ʙar onon ʙa sohidi gired va Xudo ʙaroi hisoʙ kardan kofist
